name: BOB'S house REMASTERED
description: the OG one is this https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/691605828 but this game is a fnaf fan game REMASTERED from like 2 years ago it is spooky and stuff and あなたが死ぬでしょ. Survive until 6AM and BOB will let you live for now. :) あなたが死ぬ時間です ハハハ. So you got to get out of his house but hes friends mite get you. :)
